title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.52 - Effect of transfer of investment to liquidating account
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.52 - Effect of transfer of investment to liquidating account

State Regulations

For the purpose of subsequent investments in and
redemptions of shares of the mutual trust investment company, the value of any
investment transferred to a liquidating account shall be
excluded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.52

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
